snippet.title: Too Hot to Handle 3 | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
This time, you're the bombshell. Crash the retreat and stir up drama among couples in this season of the hit dating game. Juicy surprises await.

Play Too Hot to Handle 3 on your mobile devices. Available exclusively on Netflix: 
https://www.netflix.com/game/81754209

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services, with 270 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

Too Hot to Handle 3 | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix
